_xResult.title: Girl next door white crop top
_xResult.shortdesc: Girl next door white crop top
_xResult.longdesc:
Gather all your charm to wear this gathered crop top. Made in viscose crepe, this blouse has waist gathers to give you the perfect fit. The puffed peasant style sleeves gives you all the girl next door feels. Made in comfort fit this can be styles with high waist denims, skirts and pants.

Easy customisation options are available. You can customise the neckline into round, boat and off shoulder. Sleeve length and blouse length can be customised according to your preference! Also this beautiful blouse comes with colour variations.
